ARABIC: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and make me highly esteemed among the later peoples;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And uphold my name with posterity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and grant me an honourable reputation among posterity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Make my words come true in the future.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And give me proper fame among the succeeding generations.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And grant me an honorable mention in later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And ordain for me a goodly mention among posterity
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and appoint me a tongue of truthfulness among the others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And give unto me a good report in later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: give me a good name among later generations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And appoint for me an honourable mention among the posterity
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Confer on me a worthy repute among the posterity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And grant me an honourable mention in later generations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And appoint me a tongue of truthfulness among the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And give me a reputation of truth among the others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:84] And confer on me a worthy repute, excellent praise, among posterity, those who will come after me up to   the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And give unto me a good report) a good mention (in later generations) those who come after me.
